creator.description:
Delivering digital safety and security services and products for individuals, businesses, and governments around the world.

See something that doesn't look right? Report it to us; we'll get right to work to deliver an accurate decision.

locales.description: This label is applied to content that we assess is missing critical context in order to be truthfully and honestly understood.
locales.name: Missing context

locales.description: This label is applied to content that contains requests for money or donation to an individual or entity acting as or on behalf of a charity, that we are unable to follow a paper trail to verify the authenticity of.
locales.name: Unverified financial cause

locales.description: This label is applied to content that is written in a serious tone, but that is a joke or is sarcastic, the punchline of which surrounds the usage of a serious tone which could mislead more literal thinkers.
locales.name: Satire

locales.description: This label is applied to content that is assessed to be a form of targeted or purposeful misinformation meant to elicit a mislead or otherwise misinformed reaction from an audience.
locales.name: Disinformation

locales.description: This label is applied to content that is likely to mislead or mis-inform a user without malice.
locales.name: Misinformation

locales.description: This label is applied to content that contains malware, spyware, info-stealers, unwanted code, programs, or otherwise dangerous content.
locales.name: Malware

locales.description: This label is applied to content that contains advertisements, websites, or other content intended to maliciously mislead a user.
locales.name: Phishing

locales.description: This label is applied to content that intimidates, threatens, or demeans individuals or groups based on attributes such as race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or disability.
locales.name: Hate speech

locales.description:
This label is applied to content that misleads, misrepresents to, or otherwise aims to deceive the end-user.

Content bearing this label should not be trusted.
locales.name: Fraud and scams

locales.description: This label is applied to content that is deemed generally inappropriate for the platform.
locales.name: Inappropriate content
